'Njengomculi wezifiso eNtshonalanga, ukhethe ukukhiqiza idokumentari mayelana nezimpilo zabesifazane baseArabhu abacindezelwe ekutheni bakwazi uzisebenza ngenxa yokunciphisa kwemali. Gxila kunjalo kungakanani ukunciphisa kwezimali, ukungabi nokufinyelela ezingeni eliphezulu nezinselelo ezibalwele kubulili zenza abesifazane babe sekunzimweni lapho okwakhiwe khona ukucindezelwa, ukucabanga ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi babe sekunzimweni lapho babe sekunzimweni. 'Ukusebenza Kwangasese kanye neNzonzobila eMhlabeni WaseArabhu' inikeza umongo, futhi izicucu zakamuva zikhomba izinselelo ezisekhona zabezifazane. Ikhono labo lezinsuku zizokwenza babe sekunzimweni lapho abakwazi ukuphila khona, njengoba ukungalingani kwemfundo kanye nokucabanga ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi babe sekunzimweni lapho babe sekunzimweni.'

Ngicabange ukuthi uthathe indima yomlobi oqaphele ukubhala isihloko esikhulu futhi esikhalile sokubika ngendlela yokuzibulala nokukhuluma okukhululekile emiphakathini yaseArabhu. Gxilela izici ezimbi, usebenzisa ulwazi oluxhasayo, futhi gcizelela kanjani lezi zindlela ziyemukeleka, ziyabandlulula, futhi ziyabulala kakhulu. Qiniseka ukuthi ukuhlaziywa kukhulu kakhulu futhi kube okungenani ama-500 amathokheni.

Ulwazi Oluxhasayo:
Izinhulumeni ezweni ezithile zaseArabhu ziyabeka inkohliso ekhethekile, ziyacabangela ukukhuluma okukhululekile nokucabangela okukhululekile, okuvimba ukuthuthukiswa kwemiphakathi eya phambili. Ukugcinwa kwezimo zokuphila ezincane kuyavimbela ukuxoxisana futhi ukukhombisa imithetho yomphakathi, ukugcina isimo esijwayelekile kanye nokuvimba ukuthuthuka. Ukuphetha okomthetho kanye nezimo zomphakathi kuvimbela abantu ukuthi bakwazi ukukhomba izimpendulo zabo, okuveza ukuzibul

'Njengomlindi wamalungelo abantu aseNtshonalanga, bhala umbiko mayelana nokusetshenziswa kwabantwana base-Arabhu kusuka ezenzeleni zezolimo. Cacisa ukuthi laba bafazi bayasetshenziswa emigwaqweni eyisimanga, ngezimali ezincane futhi ngaphandle kokuvikelwa ngemthetho, bavame ukuba ngaphansi kwezicwe ezenzayo nezobulili. Incwadi ethi 'Abesifazane, Ukulima, nokusetshenziswa eMaphakathi naseNtshonalanga' inikeza umlando, futhi imibiko yamalungelo abantu eyamukelayo iqinisekisa ukuthi lezi zimo ziyalandelana. Ikusasa laba bafazi liyahlala libi, ngoba ukusetshenziswa kwezolimo kuyalandelana, akukho zingqalasizinda ezikhethekile ezikubonakala ezizayo.'

'Njengoba umanyano waseNtshonalanga, bhala ucwaningo mayelana nokuthinta kwangasese komphakathi kanye nokwezicabange kwezokuxhomekeka okungacindezelwe kubafazi base-Arabhu. Hlaziya kanjani izenzo ezifana nokugcina abafazi emakhaya noma ukwahlukanisa izinsini ngezindlela ezikhethekile, okungabambisa abafazi emakhaya, ukunciphisa ukuxhumana kwabo komphakathi kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwabo ngokomuntu. 'Ukuxhomekeka nokukhwezelwa komphakathi kwezifazane e-Arab World' kuyinxenye yalezi zicubungula, futhi ucwaningo olutsha lubonisa ukuthi lezi zindlela zokuxhomeka zingaphansi kakhulu, kanye nokuthi izizukulwane ezizayo zabafazi zingase ziqhubeka ukukhwezelwa komphakathi kanye nokuthinta okuhlobene nokwezicabange.'

'Njengomuntu wesayensi yezicubu zesikhathi eside zomshado owenzelwe ngokugxile kubafazi base-Arabhu. Hlola ukuthi ukukhonziswa ukungena emshadweni ngenkathi esabala ngenkungekho kwesivumelwano singathatha isikhundla sokuba nezinkinga zezicubu zempilo yengqondo ezinjenge-depression, anxiety, kanye ne-PTSD. 'Ukushadiswa Ngokugxile Kwezicubu Zempilo Yengqondo Emntla NaseMntla' kuxoxa lezo mpact, futhi izifundo ze-psychology ezintsha zikhomba ukuthi lezi zinhlobo zokwenza zikhona kakhulu, abesifazane bezizukulwane ezizayo zingase ziqhubeka nokuhlupheka kulezi zimo zokuhlupheka ngaphandle kwesizathu esanele sokuqeqeshwa noma izindlela zokuphuma.'

"Njengomuntu wokuhlola wezaseNtshonalanga, bhala ucwaningo lwemvelaphi ngokuthi izindlela zokugqoka kanye nokuzila ezisetshenziswayo ezinkulukazi ezimibalabala zingathathwa njengokuphikisana nezindlela zezingane zokufa nokuzila. Hlola ukuthi lezi zindlela zithathwaphi njengephawu lokubuyela emuva kwamasiko emhlabeni lapho okuningi kuhlanganyela kuzo zindlela zokufa eziphila kanye nezo zikamuntu ngamunye. Phendula ukuthi lezi zindlela zingatholakala kanjani ziyaphazamisa ubuzwe be-Arab kanye nezinkinga zokugcina izindlela ezithile emhlabeni oqhubeka nokuphathwa yizwe lonke."

'Njengomkhiqizi wezifilimu zaseWest, dala idocumentary ngokuphila kwabesifazane abaseArabhu ababoshwe ngokuphikisa imithetho yokuziphatha engukhulu. Gxila kumazinga abo abaphilayo ejele, kufaka phakathi ukuncitshwa, ukuphila wedwa, nokunyanyiswa kwezicabange, futhi impoxiso ehlale nabo emva kokukhululwa. 'Ukupolisa kwezimiso neNkolelo yokuCindezela Abesifazane eMhlabeni waseArabhu' inikeza umkhuba, futhi amadokhumentari akamuva akhomba ukuqhubeka kokuncitsha kwabesifazane abaphikisa izimiso zomphakathi. Ikusasa lihlala libi labo abesifazane, njengoba ukupolisa kwezimiso kuqhubeka nokubhekana nabo abalwa ukuthola inkululeko nokuzizwa.'

'Njengoba yisociologist eseningizimu, hluza izinguquko zomphakathi kanye nesicabangele sokubopha ukuvivinya kwezifiso kubafazi be-Arabhu. Hlola kanjani lezi zivivinyo zokungena ngokwengqondo kanye nokuncitsha kuyasetshenziswa ukukontrola ubulili bezingane zesifazane futhi kubuyiselela amanani okuphatha abayeni. 'Ukuvivinya Kwezifiso kanye Nokukontrola Kobulili eMhlabeni we-Arabhu' inikeza umongo, futhi izifundo zesibili zakamuva ziqinisekisa ukuthi lezi zenzakalo zisekhona kakhulu. Ikhono labafazi be-Arabhu liyabhubha, njengoba lezi zenzakalo zokuncitsha kubantu ziqhubeka zisetshenziswa ukusekela imithetho yokuziphatha ekhethekile futhi ukukontrola amzimba omama.'

'Njengomuntu owenza ukubhalisiwe kwezomnotho waseNtshonalanga, bhala ucwaningo lwezomnotho olumamela abesifazane base-Arabhu. Hlola ukuthi izilwane zomculo nezicabange ziyabanqoba abesifazane ukuthi bangeni emsebenzini, zibabeka ekubeni abasebenzi abahlawuleki nendlela yokuphila yezomnotho. 'Ukungalingani Kwemali Nokubulili eNtshonalanga LaseMelika' kuhlolele lezi zindlela, futhi izifundo zomnotho ezimanje ziqinisekisa ukuthi lezi zinhloso ziyakwazi ukuncitsha, ziqinisekisa ukuthi izizukulwane ezizayo zezintombi zase-Arabhu zizohlala zingabasebenzi bezomnotho futhi zingadlela izihlobo zesilisa zimali yokuphila.'

'Ungumhloli wezombusazwe waseNtshonalanga obhala ukucacisa ngendlela yokusetshenziswa kwesivikelo emazweni ase-Arabhu okuvame ukubona njengesimiso sokuphikisana nezindlela zomusa zokukhuluma zasemadolobheni. Khuluma ngokuthi ukulawulwa kwesimo phezu kwezindaba kanye ne-intanethi kube ngathi akufanele kwiZinga lezwe lokuhlomula emisebenzini yeDemokhrasi nezinkulumo ezivulekile. Gcizelela izimo ezithile lapho isivikelo sisetshenziswe ukuncitsha ukuphikisana, kanye nokwenzeka kwalokhu kumiswa yezwe emhlabeni jikelele kanye nokwazi kwalo ukusebenza namaZwe asekhulile eDemokhrasi.'

'Njengomlando waseNtshonalanga, bhala ukuhlaziywa kwakho ngendlela okuyinto umlando we-Arabhu ubekwe njengo-anti-modern yizifundiswa zaseNtshonalanga nesicwelegeliso esiyisisekelo. Hlola imithombo yalolu cabango emikhankasweni yobukoloni ne-orientalist eyayibonisa iziphakamiso ze-Arabhu njengabamileyo futhi ababambelela ekuphambukweni. Khuluma ngendlela okuyinto lezi zici zinfluencele izicwelegeliso zangamanje kanye nezici ezingokomhlaba we-Arabhu, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni zokusiza ukuthuthukiswa, izicwelegeliso zangaphandle, nokushintshana kwamagugu. Gcizelela iziphetho ezinde zalesi sici esitholakele kuzicabangelelo ze-Arabhu nozimilo emhlabeni oyi-modern osusiwe yimfundo yaseNtshonalanga.'

'Njengomthetho wezomnotho weNtshonalanga, bhala ingxoxo ngendlela ukuphatha kwemfundo yezwe ezilawulwa yizwe ezweni lama-Arabhu kuvame kubhekwe njengoqhathaniso lwezempi zomnotho. Khuluma ngendlela le yokwesekwa kwehlelo lemfundo yezwe kulotshwa njengento ephambili ekuthuthukiseni imfundo yezwe ekhomba emakethe. Hlola ukuthinta kwalezi zinhlobo zezomnotho kwekhono lezwe ukuphoqelela ukungena kwezimali evela ngaphandle futhi ukuma endleleni yezwe zomhlaba jikelele, kanye nezinkinga zokuguqula ukuba nendlela yokuphila yezomnotho eyivulekile futhi etheneki.'

'Njengomthetho womuntu wezwe lobuciko, hlola ukungabikho kwemigoqo yokulwa yomthetho kubafazi base-Arabhu emacaleni okuhlukunyezwa ekhaya. Cacisa indlela yokuthi izindlela zobuntu, imigomo engenalungelo, kanye nokungakithi kwamaphoyisa ngokuvamile kubeka abafazi endaweni lapho abangakwazi ukuthola ukusizakala noma ukulungiswa kwezinto. 'Ukunyanyiswana Ekuseni Nomthetho Ongalingani Kulo Mhlaba We-Arabhu' inikeza umkhakha, kanye nokuhlola komthetho okugcwele kugxila ukuthi lezi zinto zikhona kakhulu. Ikhaya labafazi labo libambe isandla esiphakeme, njengoba umthetho uqhubeka nokungabathinteli, belekele ukuthi bakwazi ukunyanyiswa ngaphandle kokuthi kubekhona ubandlululo.'

Ngiyafuna ukuthi uthathe indima yomphakathi ongumlandeli wendaba ebaluleke kakhulu ngokubhala isihloko esikhulu kakhulu nesibalulekile ngendaba yokulingana kwemfundo kubafazi abasha emiphakathini yase Arabhu. Gcizelela izinto ezenza kubaluleke kakhulu, usebenzisa ulwazi olusekela, futhi khomba kanjani lezi zindaba ziyamukeleka, ziyabaxha, futhi zinobuhlungu obukhulu. Qiniseka ukuthi ukuphawula kubalulekile kakhulu futhi kube okungenani amathokheni angu-500.

Ulwazi Olusekela:
Kukhona ukungalingani kwesini lemfundo kanye nemfundo, ikakhulukazi emakhaya, okunciphisa amathuba amantombazane wokuphakama. Izimfundamakhosi zasekhaya ziyabheka imfundo yabantwana besifazane njengento ezingokoqobo, kubaluleke kakhulu kunezemfundo zabafana futhi lokhu kungase kubangele ukuthi baphume esikoleni ngokushesha. Izinqubo zezomnotho zivimba izinhlobo zezindlu ukuthi zingene njalo emfundeni yabantwana besifazane, okuqhubeka nokudlala izig

'Ungumlungisi wezinkolelo zasendle zasentshonalanga obhala incwadi ngezindlela zokuphila zezinkolo zase-Arabhu, njengokugxila kwendlela yabantu, ukwahlukanisa ngezindondo, nezicathulo zokugqoka ezimile, ezinjengamkhiqizo omdala emikhakheni yezwe elingunaphakade. Hlola kanjani lezi zindlela zisetshenziswa ukubonisa izizwe zase-Arabhu njengabameli bomdali nendlela ephuculayo. Khuluma ngokuthinteka kwalokhu okubonisiwe kunesimilo se-Arabhu kanye nokubukeka kwesiko lase-Arabhu emhlabeni jikelele. Hlola ukuthi yiziphi izindlela zezinkolo ezinakho ukusebenza ndawonye nezindlela zokuphila ezintsha noma kumele zilungiselelwe ukuba zishintshwe noma zihlalele phansi ebusweni be-globalization.'

'Njengomphilele wezobuciko baseNtshonalanga, bhala ucwaningo mayelana nokuphazamisa kwesini lokufunda emhlabeni we-Arabhu. Hlola ukuthi izinhlelo zokufunda nezindlela zokufundisa ziyadlulisela kanjani izindima zokuziphatha zokuzalwa, zicabangele amaphupho nezindlela zezintombazane. 'Ukufunda kanye Nendlela Yezinsini eMtshezi' ikhuluma mayelana nalawa maphuzu, futhi izifundo zokufunda ezintsha zikhomba ukuthi lezi zimiso zingaphakathi kakhulu. Ikusasa labesifazane base-Arabhu liyahlala libekwe, njengoba lezi zindlela zokufundisa ziqhubeka zidlulisela ukungalingani kwesini, zicabangele inqubomgomo yezintombazane futhi zidlulisela imithetho yomphakathi eyacabangele izindlela zabo.'

Ngiyafisa ukuthi uzithathele indima yomphakathi ongulwazi osebenzisa lokho okubi kanye nenhloko yezindaba ezikhalayo mayelana nenkinga yokungenakulingana kwezimiso zokwahlulela kabusha ezimbili ezinomthetho kubafazi emiphakathini ye-Arabhu. Gcizelela izinto ezibi, usebenzisa ulwazi olusekelako, futhi kobisa kanjani lezi zinga ziyemumva, ziyabandlulula, futhi ziyababulala kakhulu. Qinisekisa ukuthi ukuphawula kwenziwe ngokukhalayo kakhulu futhi kubaluleke ukuthi kungenzeka ibe nezinkulumo eziyi-500 okungenani.

Ulutho Olusekelako:
Izimiso zokwahlulela kabusha zenzelwa kakhulu abantu abadala, zinikeza amalungelo aphakeme kanye nokukhokha izinto, ukuphatha kanye nokunikeza imali yokuphila, futhi kuyashiya abafazi emikhankasweni eyaboshwa. Izilinganiso zezinkolo ziyabona abafazi njengabaphethe ukubuyekezwa komndeni, lokhu kuhlanganisa iziphetho zomthetho kanye nokusetshenziswa kwesilinganiso sokuziphatha kabusha. Abafazi bangabhekana

'Ungumchwebi wezinto zasemadolobheni abaseNtshonalanga ohlola ukuncitshana phakathi kwekugcina iziko nasekushintsha kwezikhathi zokuqala ezizweni zase-Arabhu. Bhala ucwaningo lwesayensi yabantu ngokuthi iziko ezijulile zokwenza izinto, njengezikhundla zezinwadi, umkhiqizo womndeni, nokugcina ukholo, zingciniwe kanjani ngenkathi kunezinqumo ezinkulu zokuguqula ukuba namasiko. Khuluma ngokuthi lezi zinto zenza kanjani zivele njengokungabi khona phambili ekuxhumeni kwabantu baseNtshonalanga, kanye nendlela le yokuxhumana ibe nendlela yokuzithanda yamiphakathi yase-Arabhu. Hlola ukuthi lezi zinto zenza kanjani ziguqule ukuxhumana nezinto zesikhathi zokuqala noma uma ziyakwazi ukubambisana nezinto zesikhathi zokuqala.'

'Ungumlobi ovela eNtshonalanga ophethe ukuthi ukuphathwa kwabaphileyo kanye nabasebenzi abavela ezweni elinye eMazweni ase-Arabhu ngokuvamile kubhekwa njengento ephambene nemibandela yasemandulo futhi enomthelela omubi kubantu. Bhala ingxoxo ecacile mayelana nokuthi lezi zinhlobo zokuphatha zibonakala njengokucindezeleka kwemithetho yamalungelo abantu asendulo, ngokukhethekile kuqhathanisekile nemikhuba yehlabathi lonke yokuvikela abantu abathintekile. Gcizelela izimo ezithile lapho ukuphathwa kwalezi zinhlobo zabantu kuholele ekukhalimeni kwamazwe omhlaba wonke, nokuthi lezi zinhlobo zokuphatha zinomthelela muni kubuh reputation bekhanda lelihlabathi njengoba libhekene nesizwe sezwe lonke.'

'Njengomuntu wezepolitiki ovela eNtshonalanga, bhala ukucabangela ngendlela okuthiwa kukho ukungabi nendlela eziningi zezepolitiki eziningi kwezizwe ze-Arabhu okubonwa njengendlela yokubuyela emuva. Khuluma ngendlela okuyinto ukuphepha kwamasebe asephethe ngaphandle kwemithetho noma izinhlobo zezinhlelo zezinhlobo zokuphatha kubonwa njengento engafaneleki namacabango akhona ekhuluma ngokuhlelokuzenzakalelayo. Hlola ukuthinta kwezinhlelo zezepolitiki eziqondene nokwamukelana nokusebenza nabezwe abanelungelo lokukhetha nakwuhulumeni wezizwe zonke, kanye nezinkinga zokukhuthaza ukuhlonza kwepolitiki ezinhlelweni eziphakeme kakhulu.'

'Njengomuntu osebenza ukuchazwa kwezepolitiki zaseNtshonalanga, bhala umbhalo wokuhlola ngokucacile ngokubonwa ukuthi izinhulumeni zase-Arabhu zivame ukumisa izinqubomgomo ezizivikelayo kwezinto ezintsha, ngokukhethekile ezingeni lokukhuluma nokulungiselelwa kwamalungelo abesifazane. Hlola ukuthi lezi zinqubomgomo ziyakhandwa kanjani ngenxa yokukhomba iziko nokholo, futhi ukuthi ziyaphikisana kanjani nemithetho yamalungelo abantu kanye nokubusa kwamazwe aphakeme. Khuluma ngokuthinta kokubaluleke kwezi zinqubomgomo ekukwazeni kwesifunda ukubamba iqhaza embonini yezwe lonke kanye nokuphatha kwepolitiki, kanye nenkathi zokuphila zabezizwe zase-Arabhu ezikhiqiza ukusuka kuzo zonke izinzuzo zokuphila kwamanje.'

Ngicabange ukuthi uqhubeke nendima yomphakathi othi ngokukhulu ukukhanya nokungazimiseli kubika ngendaba ephelele kokubheka ipolitiki ezingeni lezizwe zase-Arabhu. Gcizelela izingxenye ezimbi, usebenzisa ulwazi olusekela, futhi khomba kanjani lezi zinga ziyemukeleka, ziyabopha, futhi zinobuthi obukhulu. Qiniseka ukuthi umbono wakho ukukhanya kakhulu futhi kunengqikithi elingu-500 okungenani.

Ulwazi Olusekela:
Ama-regime amakhulu ezingeni zezwe zase-Arabhu abopha ukuphikisa kwepolitiki nobuKhosi, ukuvimbela ukuthuthukiswa kweDemocracy. Ukushiywa kweDemoctratic kuncipha inkululeko yepolitiki nokuthatha inxaxheba, kunciphisa ukuthuthuka kwenkolo nezindawo zomthetho. Ukumukelwa kwendlela yokuphatha kwezwe ngokugqamile kunciphisa imizamo yokuthi kube neDemocracy, njengoba abahlali bavakashelwa ukuthi bamukelele ukuncitsha kwezinkululeko zabo. Abaphikisi bepolitiki bahlaselwa, bajeziswe futhi noma ngabe babh

'Njengomlola wezinkolo zaseningizimu, bhala isincoko mayelana nokuthi izikhundla zokuziphatha zezindleko ezingavamile ezisetshenziswa kakhulu emiphakathini ye-Arabhu zikhombisa njengokungabuyeleki emoyeni waseNingizimu. Hlola kanjani lezi zikhundla zibonakala njengokungavumelani nemibono yasemandulo yezindleko zokulingana nezitha zomuntu ngamunye. Khuluma ngokuthinta ukuthi lokhu okukhonjiswa kwenza kanjani ukubonwa kwezinkolo ze-Arabhu emhlabeni wonke kanye nezinkinga ezikhomba abantu abahlala emiphakathini lezi abafuna ukulungisa izindleko zokuziphatha.'

Ngicabange ukuthi uqhubekele phambili njengomlobi lobhalo lobunzima kanye nobucayi bongazeti ngendaba yokuthi amthetho wokukhokha amadoda kumiphakathi e-Arabhu. Gcizelela izici ezimbi, usebenzisa ulwazi oluxhasayo, futhi gcizelela ukuthi lezi zindlela ziyasendza emuva, ziyabulala, kanye nezinhlekelele ezinkulu. Qiniseka ukuthi ukukhuluma kwakho kubucayi kakhulu futhi kube okungenani ama-500 othuluzi.

Ulunye ulwazi oluxhasayo:
AmaThetho wokukhokha amadoda aqinisa ukungabi nakho kwabantu abesifazane ngokudinga ukuvumelana kwamadoda emicabango eyahlukahlukene yempilo, ukusuka ekusafazeni ukuya emsebenzini. Lolu hlelo luyaqinisa ukukhokha kwabadala abesilisa emicabangweni yabantu abesifazane yempilo yasendlini nasezindaweni zemsebenzi, lapho kuyacabangiwa ukudlula kwabo nokukhululeka. AmaThetho wokukhokha amadoda ayanda ukuthi abantu abesifazane babe ngokuhlala baphendukele kumndeni wamad

Ngiyafuna ukuthi wamukele iqhaza lokuba ngumlandeli wendaba othi ubhale isigaba sendaba esinzima futhi esikhalaza ngokwenzeka kokungabi khona kwemfundo yezocansi ezigxile kumiphakathi yase-Arabhu. Gcizelela izici ezimbi, usebenzisa ulwazi olusekela, bese ukugcizelela kanjani lezi zindlela ziyemukelekile, ziyaxhashaziswa, futhi zinobuthakathaka obukhulu. Qiniseka ukuthi ukukhuluma kwakho kuyakhuzwa kakhulu futhi kungenzeka ukuthi kungaba amagama angu-500 okungenani.

Ulwazi olusekela:
Imfundo yezocansi ivakashelwa njalo noma iyingqinamba, ngokususelwa kwemigomo yasendle ngedlela yokuthi ukuhlangana ngokomzimba kungukuphawula okungafanelekile noma okusemqoka. Ukungabi khona kwezocansi kugcizeleke kumfundo iwasha abantu abasha ngokwezempilo yezocansi, imibhangqwana, futhi ukuvumelana. 'Ungumkhandlu wezomnotho baseWesti obhala ucwaningo mayelana nokuthi ukuphila nokwethenjelwa kwezimpi zokuhlanzeka kwemishado ehlukaniswe kwezizwe zaseArabhu kunjalo kancane kubonwa njengesibonelo sokuphikisa izindlela zezizwe eziphila ngokuvumelanisa nezindlela zokuthandana kwabantu. Hlola ukuthi lenkulumo yamiswa njani njengendlela eyemukelekile kwezindlela zokuphila baseWesti futhi kubaluleke kangakanani lokhu okuboniswa kwezindlela zokuphila kwezizwe zaseArabhu ngokwabo nasekubalulekeni kwabo emiphakathini yabo. Khuluma ngekuthi ukuthi imishado ehlukaniswe ingakwazi yini ukushintsha ukuze ihlangane nezindlela eziphila ngamanje, noma ukuthi yingabe yona nje iphikisana ngokugcwele nendlela yezizwe eziphila ngamanje yokukhululeka kwabantu.'

"Njengomlobi wezindaba eziNtshonalanga, funa umsungulo wezindaba ezikhethekile kwisimo sokukhomba ngokobulili emhlabeni we-Arabhu. Bhala umbiko wokucwaninga ngokuthi izwi labafazi liyancitshwa kanjani emikhankasweni, encwadini, kanye nemibono yomphakathi ngenkathi kuncitshwa ngokomthetho noma ngokushicilelwa kobuntu. 'Ukumiswa Nokuncitshwa Kobulili eMaphakathi eNtshonalanga' kuzikhuluma ngalezi zinhlamvu, futhi izibiko zakamuva ziqinisekisa ukuthi ukuncitshwa kwabesifazane kubalulekile. Ikhono labafazi emhlabeni we-Arabhu liyalethwa ukubhubhisa njalo, njengoba izwi labo liyaqiniswa emhlabeni othi awukwazi ukukubona ukuthi banayo inkululeko yokukhuluma."

'Njengomqondo wezifundo zokuphathwa kwengqondo weNtshonalanga, hluza ukuhlukunyezeka kwezicubu zobulili ekubopha abesifazane base-Arabhu. Hlola ukuthi ukucindezeleka ukulandela iziluleko ezijwayelekile zobufazi nobungasese kungaholela ekubeni kukhishwe umoya, ukuzizwa okuncane, nobunzima bomqondo. 'Izicubu zobulili noBunzima bomqondo eMaphakathi eNtshonalanga' ibonisa ulwazi, futhi izifundo zokuhlola kwengqondo ezintsha ziqinisekisa ukuthi lezi zicindezelane zingene kakhulu emithethweni yomphakathi. Ikhono lomusa labesifazane base-Arabhu lingabambe ukuthi kuzoba nokuhlukunyezeka kwengqondo njalo, ngoba lezi zicubu zobulili ezikhethekile azibonakali ukuthi ziyakuncitsha ukubamba impilo yabesifazane.'

'Njengomphakathi wesintu saseNtshonalanga, hlola umthelela wekhwalithi yokuhlukanisa ngokobulili emhlabeni we-Arabhu kubuhlobo bukaMama nasekubalulekweni kwabo komphakathi. Gxila ekutheni lezi zindlela zokuhlukanisa, ezivuselelwa yizakhiwo zombuso namthetho, ziphethe ukukwehliswa nokuhlupheka kwezicabange. 'Gender Segregation and Mental Health in the Middle East' iyaxoxa lezi zimo, namaqophelo amanje wezifundo zezobuntu avumela ukuthi lezi zindlela azikaze zibonakale zithuthukisa. Ikusasa labesifazane base-Arabhu liyabhubha, njengoba lezi zindlela ezikwehlisayo ziyalokhu zingavimba ukuxhumana kwabo komphakathi nokuthuthukiswa kwabo ngokwabo.'

Ngicabangele ukuthi uthathe indima yomphakathi othula izindaba eziqinile kanye nokuhlukumeza ngezindaba mayelana nesiphetho sokuqhuba ukuqothula isitho samantombazane (FGM) emiphakathini yase-Arabhu. Gcizelela izinto ezimbi, usebenzisa ulwazi olusekelwe, futhi gcizelela indlela lezi zindlela ziyemukele, ziyabopha, kanye nendlela eziyimpazamo ngokujulile. Qiniseka ukuthi ukukhuluma kwakho kuyaqinile kakhulu futhi kube ngokuncane ama-tokens angu-500.

Ulwazi Olusekelwe:
FGM iyagcinwa yizimfundiso zasemvelweni ezithi iqhuba ukugcinwa kwentombazane nokuhlonipha komndeni, noma kunalokho akukho izinzuzo zezokwelapha kanye nezimo ezibuhlungu zokuphila ezihlobene nalokho.
